name: Multiliens
description:
Every 10 seconds, alien intruders grow twice as powerful!
Eliminate them before it's too late.

Join the chat if you have any thoughts! 
https://discord.gg/TJQTTjt


DevLog:

I didn't have time to define what happens beyond player level 8192, which is a major oversight. But now you'll have to win early on!

The AI movement pattern changes every 5 seconds. The player is supposed to learn to get good. But due to lack of polish the message is a little too vague. I wish I had more time :)
